tree.story.text: [Start boot sequence?]
[Boot sequence successful.]
[Initializing visuals . . .]
Good morning, <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. How are you feeling?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: . . .     Much, much better.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: Good.   I'm glad. This will have to hold until <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> gets back from the wastes.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Thank you, <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.
You're welcome, <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_smile

tree.story.text: It's really not much, though. I just used the recovery protocol already in your programming.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Still . . .

[Your name is <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. You live in a settlement of robots, as most of the world is now uninhabitable as a result of the 2030 wars - leaving only you and a small group of machine workers.]
[You used to work as an idol in a group, but now there are no idol groups left to perform in.]
[Let alone any audiences to perform for . . .]
Well, I guess I've gotta go do my rounds . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Don't be a stranger, y'hear?
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I hear!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_smile

tree.story.text: [Now that you've done some basic maintenance on <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, it's time to check up on everyone else in the settlement. Who will you check on next?]
[<rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is outside right now, looking for any structural integrity issues with the shelter.]
Hi <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, how are you feeling?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Howdy <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! I must tell you, I'm feeling mighty fine today!
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: I'm glad to hear that!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: I hear you went and did some maintenance on my dear sister today, did that go well?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Yeah, the directions from <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> were very easy to follow!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: What? What is it?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Did you enjoy it? Messing with her wires?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: What!
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: That's disgusting! How inapproriate!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Don't you think what you did was inapproriate?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: I will not answer that.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: It sounds like you really enjoyed it. Firefly.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: How did you know she calls me that?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: The two of you aren't very subtle.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Well . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: Maybe I did have a little fun. It's a nice feeling, being helpful for her.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: But that's besides the point ! ! !
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Have you found any structural integrity issues with the base?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: I see right through you, missy. All of a sudden, changing the subject as if I wouldn't notice. Just so I can't interrogate you no more.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Well anyhow, there was a small problem with the generator room. Other than that, I don't see no problems. For now, that is.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: The generator room?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: . . . were you able to solve the issue?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: 'course. I was able to fix the issue. Who do you take me for, missy?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: It was nothing but minor damage to the outer wall. Easy enough to seal right up . . . had to to take some of it apart first, though.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Was that the loud noise that woke me up this morning?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Hmm. Prolly.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Had to knock it right down, that was mighty loud.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Made <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> jump right outta his skin. You'da seen it if you hadn't been asleep.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Speakin' of . . . <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>'s been keepin' track of the weather as of late, don't want no repeat of the big storm.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Yeah?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Well. It looks like a mighty big'uns comin' our way. But it ain't no storm, 's an earthquake. And, he's not sure how big it 'sposed ta be or when it's gonna hit.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: That's worrying.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Luckily, I already accounted for earthquakes, far as structural integrity's concerned. But those outer buildin's, don't know 'bout all that.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Reckon we put off any scavengin' till it's done for sure.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Alright. I'll put it on the whiteboard.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Thank you.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: . . . <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Yes?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Best take care of <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, y'hear?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: I hear ya!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: [You've talked to <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.]

Stay away from my sister! Y'hear?
<rgba:7f,7f,7f,ff>Best take care of Zuma, y'hear?
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: W-what ? ? ?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: You know what I mean, missy.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: [That was strange. But you've now talked to everyone. What to do . . .]
[It's a while before you're able to find <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>ceb2340<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. Turns out, they're on the roof. Contemplating life.]
Hello, <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. How are you feeling?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: . . . Processing . . . Processing Feeling . . .
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: And what would that feeling be?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: It has been approximately 6.307e9 seconds since the estimated end of the 2030 wars.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Ah. Yeah . . . it has been a long time, huh <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Parsing input . . .
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Input speech parsed and validated successfully.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: All seconds are precious.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Planet Earth has existed for approximately 4.543 billion years. Humanity has only existed for an estimated 2 million of those years.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Do you believe we will outlast them?
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Do you think that one of the many organic species of this planet will evolve and eventually overtake us. Only to create more of us in their own image?
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Well . . . that's a tough question. I don't know.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: I don't really think about things like that much.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: My apologies. Discomfort. As a verb: to make (someone) feel uneasy, anxious or embarassed.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: You didn't make me uncomfortable! Just . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Is there any particular reason why you're thinking about this now, <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Deterioration. Noun: The process of becoming progressively worse.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Aging refers to the physiological changes that we experience during our lifespan. It is also an inevitable part of life.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Well over 300 theories exist on the subject of aging.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: My learning program has . . .
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Deteriorated.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Oh no . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Calculating . . .
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: There is a 67.8% chance this deterioration will affect the rest of my programming. Within a matter of days.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Do you think - is there anything I or anyone can do to help?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Parsing speech input . . .
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: [ERROR:240:33] Assertion failed: Unknown variable detected: 0x87043234
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Oh . . . I see . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: I, um . . . huh . . . I-I'm sorry. I don't know what to say.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Worry. Definiton: Give way to anxiety or unease; allow one's mind to dwell on difficulty or troubles.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: I did not mean to worry you. <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: It's okay. Do you think you'll be able to hold out until <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> returns from the wastes?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: [ERROR:508:20] Assertion failed: Unknown variable detected: 0xA4341FCB
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: You spoke to <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> today and performed maintenance on her today. [Y/N]
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Yes. I did, why?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Romance. Definition: A feeling of excitement and --
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Okay. That's enough!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: You have spent 44% of your time with <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. A significantly larger amount of time than with any other robot on the settlement.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: In addition, there is a 33% chance that any conversation where <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is not involved, you will at least mention her or involve her in some way.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Furthermore, she has used a variety of pet names for --
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Pet names?!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Pet name. Definition: A name tha --
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: I know what a pet name is!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Statistically, there is a 78.6% chance that if you initiated a romantic conversation with <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, she would reciprocate.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: What do you mean only 78.6%?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Do not let my words make you hesitate.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: I've got it, I've got it . . . Thanks, <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: [You've talked to <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>ceb2340<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.]
Statistically, there is a 100.0% chance that if you initiated a romantic conversation with <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, she would absolutely not reciprocate.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: W-What?!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Should I repeat myself?
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: [That was strange. But you've now talked to everyone. What to do . . .]
[<rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is in the main "living" room where everyone comes to hang out and talk to each other. He seems to be anxiously pacing.]
Hi <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, how are you doing?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Oh god. <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. Girl. You are not going to believe this.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: What is it?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: There is going to be an earthquake. A MASSIVE. BLEEPING. EARTHQUAKE.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: What!? How big!?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: I don't know.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Well, do you know when it's going to happen, at least?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Dude, I seriously have no idea. This human instrumentation I found for it is so inexact.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Well, it kinda tends to be that way, I guess . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: In the past, I don't even think we had the technology to know earthquakes were coming, so there's that now, at least.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Yet they managed to create us. Crazy stuff, man.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: BUT ANYWAY.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: We need to get like, super prepared, we need to make a shelter, we need to --
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: I'm not sure I'm the one you should be talking to about this. <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is the one who does all the construction and prep around here, so . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: . . . I already talked to him about it.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: . . . And?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: He's not that worried about it . . .
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Why not?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Well, he says that the structural integrity of the building is sound enough to withstand a magnitude 8 earthquake. Whatever that means.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Well . . . If he thinks that, then I'm not sure there's much use in worrying too much.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Ugh! I guess.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: You should def put it on the whiteboard though. You know. Since I don't have hands to write with.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: I will!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: Anyway. How'd maintenance with your girl go?
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is not "my girl", <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: You sure? I've heard what she calls you when she thinks no one else is in audio range.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Shhh! That's private, you know!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Yeah, yeah. Why haven't you made a move anyway?
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: We all know you like each other. Even <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, and <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> doesn't know anything about "human" emotions.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: So what's the holdup, huh?
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: I guess it's just . . . I dunno. I don't want to make her feel weird.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Well, I think you should make your move soon. You two would make a great couple!
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Maybe . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Go get 'er, girl!
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: [You talked to <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. Who should you talk to next?]
Well, you're right. She's super weirded out by you and you should stay away.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: W-what?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: You heard me.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: [That was weird, but well, you talked to everyone. Now what to do?]
[Well, there was some important information that all of them gave to you, so you might as well add it all to the whiteboard where everyone can see it.]
[It seems that <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> left the living room while you were distracted. You can hear his upbeat pop music from the observation room.]
[The lyrics blare, "Can we wander for a spell? And live in parallel? I want it to be true, to be like you my love."]
[It seems like a sweet song, but you need to focus.]
[You look at the whiteboard. It says: Earthquake incoming. No scavenging until the earthquake passes. <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>ceb2340<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> requires repairs.]
[As you look at all the important things for today listed in front of you, you begin to think.]

[You're worried about <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> and their deteriorating programming, especially since you have no idea when <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is going to return, other than "within the week".]

[And the earthquake . . . It seemed like <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> wasn't particularly worried about it, which was comforting, but then again, it didn't seem like <rgba:94,50,f2,ff>Boomba<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> knew how big it was going to be or when it would happen.]
[If the building could withstand a magnitude 8 earthquake, what about something more than an 8?]
[All of this creates a pit of anxiety and restlessness within you.]
[Maybe you could take a walk and clear your mind.]

[Plus, the earthquake couldn't be that soon, could it . . . ? Maybe you can scavenge for something that could help <rgba:50,8c,fa,ff>Ceb<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>. There's a computer store very near to the base, and it isn't that dilapidated either.]
[You've made up your mind, but before you're able to leave, <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> comes into the room.]
Oh, hi <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Hi, firefly.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: Hehe . . . I was just about to take a walk, y'know, so . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy

tree.story.text: Oohh, a walk sounds nice right about now.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: But first, do you mind if we talk for a quick sec?
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: Oh! Uh. Sure! I'd love to talk.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Was there anything you wanted to talk about?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base

tree.story.text: Well, this feels real awkward, but, I figured I'd say something . . .
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I know how you feel about me.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: O-oh?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Yes, and I've been meaning to say something about it, but I've been real hesitant about it . . .
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I uh . . . The others have been badgering me to say somethin', so . . .
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I don't feel the same way at all.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: In fact, I wish you would just go away. It makes me so uncomfortable to think about you, feeling that way about me.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I wish you would just die.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: S-so? Um, what do you, think?
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I have to go.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: [You run outside. <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> is calling after you, seemingly confused, but you don't know why, after what she just said . . .]
[That was really intense. You had no idea she felt like that about you.]
[Maybe things can still be worked out with her, as friends, or at least comrades, but for now . . . You just need to get some air.]
[And while you're out here, you can go to that computer store and see if there are any parts left to scavenge.]
[The building itself is pretty worn on the outside. The logo has been faded by the sands of time for so long that not even the outline remains. Still it seems to stand strong.]
[The inside of it is only slightly less decrepit. There's broken furniture everywhere, bits and pieces of technology strewn in every direction.]
[You're thinking about where to start, when you hear a familiar voice coming from a deeper part of the store.]
Hello?
[You would recognize <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>'s voice from anywhere. Why are they in this abandoned computer store?]
[Maybe they're looking for the same things as you - parts for repair.]
<rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>? Where are you?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Hello? <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>? Hello?
Yes, it's me, <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Why are you here?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>? Please, <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>!
Please, <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, help!
Huh!? Are you okay??
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: Please, help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
Hang on, I'll try to come find you!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_surprise

tree.story.text: [<rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>'s voice is starting to sound strange . . . Almost glitchy. They must be in real trouble. You should go help them!]
Please help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
Keep talking, okay!? I'll figure out where you are!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: Please help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
[It's strange, as when you venture further into the store, it seems larger than what you first guessed it to be.]
Please help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
[In fact, it starts to get a bit ridiculous, just how big this store apparently is. And <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>'s voice isn't getting any closer.]
Please help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
<rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>!? What's happening!?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral

tree.story.text: [But you need to help them.]
Please help! <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>! Please help me!
[But you need to help them.]
Please help! Please help!

[But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them. But you need to help them.]
What's going on!? I don't understand!!!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_neutral

tree.story.text: Please, someone, help!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_neutral

tree.story.text: HELP! HELP! HELP!
[You can't fail them. You can't fail them. YOU CAN'T FAIL THEM.]
[You have failed them.]
[When you wake up, you feel like you're falling through the floor. And then you wake up. And then you wake --]
[You're standing in front of a mirror. The room you're in is both familiar and unfamiliar.]
[You hear a voice.]
You failed us.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: Wha- . . . What? <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>? What's going on?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_neutral

tree.story.text: We all hate you, firefly.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: I reckon you messed this one up mighty fine, pardner.
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: Please . . . No . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepiest_neutral

tree.story.text: Yeah dude. We all were expecting so much of you.
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: The past cannot be changed. You failed us.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: Stop . . . STOP!!!!
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepiest_neutral

tree.story.text: [The room begins to shake. You don't know what's happening, but they all scream at you, and you scream too.]
[And then it goes black.]
[When you wake up, you're in the living room of the base.]
H . . . Huh? What . . . What happened?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_base

tree.story.text: You gave us a real scare, that's what happened!
tree.story.animation.name: stefan

tree.story.text: S . . . <rgba:ff,ca,0a,ff>Stefan<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_base

tree.story.text: Yo, what did you run off for!?
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: I . . . Uhh . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_base

tree.story.text: My sensors indicated that you went to the abandoned computer store, and I alerted the others.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>? What were you doing in the computer store when the earthquake happened?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Me? What were *you* doing in the computer store?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepiest_base

tree.story.text: I was never in the computer store.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: What? I, I saw you . . . I . . . Why can't I feel my face?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepiest_base

tree.story.text: Hun, don't panic - but you were damaged when the building collapsed.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Damaged!?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_creepy_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: N . . . Now everyone can tell . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_blank_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: [Everyone is silent for a minute, before <rgba:57,ff,65,ff>4m<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> clears their "throat".]
<rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, you said before you saw me in the store.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Y . . . Yeah. It was weird, a lot of stuff happened in there . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_blank_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: I may have an explanation for that.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: What do you mean?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_blank_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: When the others took you out of the wreckage, you were more damaged than you are now. I did some maintenance.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Not only were you physically damaged, but there were some very severe errors and loops in your programming.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, have you been letting the others do maintenance on you?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: When there are advanced AI's with such complicated programming as ourselves, it can often degrade, causing strange behavior and hallucinations.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Oh . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: Were you experiencing anything strange before you went to the computer store?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Something that would cause you to run off like that?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: . . . Maybe.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> said . . . Uh.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> said what?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: <rgba:ff,42,42,ff>Zuma<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, did you say something to <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff> before she ran away?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: . . . Yes. I was . . . I was . . .
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: It's important for you to tell me what transpired, to see if there are any inconsistencies.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: . . .I was tellin' her how I liked her, is all.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: Ooooohh! Zuzu made the first move!
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: You . . . You said you liked me?
tree.story.animation.name: jade_base_exp

tree.story.text: Yeah? What did you hear . . .?
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: . . . I'd rather not talk about it.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: Well, I'd like to do some more diagnostics, but . . . <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>, why didn't you tell anyone you were having errors?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: I have a theory, if I may.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Out of all of us, you're the most human in appearance . . . Did you think you needed to be consistent with a human for some reason?
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: . . . I thought since you guys really like humans, it would be comforting if I was like that . . .
tree.story.animation.name: jade_neutral_exp

tree.story.text: I see.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: Well, for the record --
tree.story.animation.name: boomba

tree.story.text: Our love for you is not dependent on your humanity.
tree.story.animation.name: ceb

tree.story.text: We really like you . . . I really like you.
tree.story.animation.name: zuma

tree.story.text: All of us adore you, regardless of your lack of humanity, <rgba:3b,de,35,ff>Jade<rgba:ff,ff,ff,ff>.
tree.story.animation.name: 4m

tree.story.text: . . . *Sniff*
tree.story.animation.name: jade_smile_exp

tree.story.text: Thanks, guys. I love you all too.
tree.story.animation.name: jade_happy_exp

tree.story.text: [There may not be any audiences to perform for now, but you don't think you'll be missing that anytime soon.]
[You're sure things will still be difficult, but you're sure of one thing.]
[You'll have your friends with you.]
